title: Leilung hi lawmin au se
lyrics:
Leilung hi lawmin au se,
Lalpa thawh leh ni hian;
Lei mi tan chanchin lawmawm,
Pathian tan pawh lawmna.
Thihna ata nunna kawng,
Pa hnen ngei thlenna chu;
Lal Krista hnehna hla nen,
A mite tan a siam.

Thinlung sual hi lo fim se,
Chatuan Lal tholeh chu;
Eng ropui tak zingah chuan,
Chiang taka kan hmuh nan.
Ama aw ri duhawm chu,
Thinlungin hria ila;
Thinlung chhungrila biak chuan,
Thim zawng a kiantir ang.

Van mite zawng lawm sela,
Lei miten zai rem se;
Khawvel zawng hi hlim sela,
A chhunga thil zawng nen.
Thil siam zawng zawng au rualin,
An lawm hla rem rawh se;
Lalpa Krista tholeh chuan,
Lawmna kin lo a thlen.
